title: Hey Riot, you know how you can nerf Riven without hitting her ult CD for the 20th time?
body:
Maybe make it so after she casts Wind Slash her ultimate steroid goes away

That way she has to choose between using her execute or keeping her massive steroid

Because the point isn't to actually hurt riven, it's just to appease riven haters without really changing anything.

Because they don't want to actually make her any weaker. It's possible they may want to shift her skill curve around because at the moment she is too weak in low-average elo and too strong in high elo, but I doubt they want to just make her weaker in general across the board.

Making her ult steroid go away would make the most sense, but I feel that's only one of several problems with Riven and her kit, and thus making the steroid go away would fix but one problem. 

I think some changes could be made to her passive that would in effect change her playstyle. Here's what I suggest:

> Passive: Riven's blade gains a charge for 5 seconds every time she casts an ability, stacking up to 3 times. Each of her basic attacks consumes **all charges** to deal 50% AD bonus physical damage for each charge consumed. 
> 

This as far as I know would make her animation canceling useless, as the damage output would be less bursty and would require more extended trades for Riven to get her maximum damage out, and even then the maximum damage put out would be **significantly less** than what it is now (assuming the bonus damage from her charges remains the same).

Here are some calculations I did:

Assume: 

* Riven level 18

* Riven 300 AD

* Riven no crit chance/armor pen

* Enemy no armor

>Current passive 
_(Q + aa, Q + aa, Q + aa)_
((90 + 180) + (300 + 150)) + ((90 + 180) + (300 + 150)) + ((90 + 180) + (300 + 150)) = 2160


___
>New passive
_(Q, Q, Q, aa)_
(90 + 180) + (90 + 180) + (90 + 180) + (300 + (150 x 3)) = 1560

It is definitely significantly less damage AS WELL AS significantly less speed, so to compensate, I'm thinking just increase the AD scaling on the stacks just a tiny bit so the max damage output is AROUND THE SAME but a little less than what it currently is. The main point though is to slow the combo down a bit so she's more of a fighter and not an assassin. 

____________

And this is just one change I would make to her kit to solve only one other problem. I think some other changes should be made to her E (tone down the AD ratio) and her R (maybe make the damage steroid equal to her damage when she has 3 stacks, but she keeps all 3 stacks for the duration of the steroid, alongside your idea of expending the steroid on second cast).

I may be wrong, but I think your entire suggestion could be condensed down to one sentence: make only the third activation of Broken Wings grant a charge for her passive instead of all three activations.

Which I like. Though instead of increasing her AD scalings, I would adjust her AS/level. Otherwise you could just mash Q and get roughly the same damage output, only now even the trick of remembering to AA between Qs has been stripped away, making Riven Even More idiotproof.

Hmm, I didn't intend for just Broken Wings to build the charges, but if that were the case then you might as well just add that as a passive on her Q and give her a whole new passive.
